attributes.action: Bring back Hanging for Murder, Terrorism, Paedophilia.
attributes.background: Instead of the punitive sentences now being handed out by our Courts. I am convinced a Peoples Referendum would give an overwhelming vote for this. The establishment doesn't like referendums as we can all see from the Brexit vote because it is the people making the decisions not the Politicians.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what action you'd like to see. We're not sure whether you want this change to happen, or whether you'd like a referendum.

If you'd like a referendum, you may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200521
